definition: A preposition used to indicate the means or method by which something is done, or to express proximity or the agent performing an action. It can also suggest a time or place, indicating the agent or source of an action.
examples: She traveled by train to work every day.
The book was written by a famous author.
I like to relax by the beach during the summer.

definition: A casual or informal way of saying farewell or goodbye, often used when parting with someone or leaving a place. It is commonly used in spoken language and informal written communication.
examples: I have to leave now, bye!
We said our goodbyes and waved, 'bye' until next time.
After the meeting, everyone said their byes and left.
